title: CQRS pattern using DynamoDB, Lambda and Elasticache
description: Implement CQRS design pattern using DynamoDB streams, Lambda and Elasticache

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to implement Command and Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS) pattern using AWS Serverless services. This pattern is leveraging the native integration between these services. In this pattern, Amazon DynamoDB is used as a write-data store and takes advantage of the out-of-box feature, DynamoDB Streams, to propagate the data changes to a read database, i.e., Amazon Elasticache for Redis using AWS Lambda
This pattern deploys one VPC with two Subnets and two Security Groups, one DynamoDB table, three Lambda functions and one Elaticache for Redis cluster.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
